content: One head emits a smoky fog, and the other shoots fire. In reality, the blinding smoke can actually be ignited by the second head to cause huge explosions, so stay away from the smoke at all costs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
One head emits a smoky fog, and the other shoots fire. In reality, the blinding smoke can actually be ignited by the second head to cause huge explosions, so stay away from the smoke at all costs.
